title: POINT_MISSION
description: A mission of viewing point. During the drone flight to the point the drone camera will auto follow the point location

azimuthToPoint.description: Constraint azimuth to point or leave to task to calculate

viewingAngle.description: Viewing angle if azimuthToPoint is true

distanceToTarget.description:
The distance the drone will observe the target on last point of flight.
If field was not sent - deafault config will be taken
